settings.free_plan_tip: Free plan available only for 250 MB Storage.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.info: Messages from contacts in the whitelist always go to Inbox folder. Marking a message as not spam adds the address to the Whitelist

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.info: Messages from contacts in the blacklist always go to Spam folder. Marking a message as spam adds the address to the Blacklist.

keys.name: Keys
keys.info: Download your PGP Keys for use with other PGP compatible services. Only incoming messages in inline OpenPGP format are currently supported.

donate.name: Donate
donate.info: Your donation helps us support more users and continue to develop CTemplar as free and open source software.

settings.features_added_soon: Features to be added to this package soon

home_page.take_back_liberty: Take Back Your Liberty with the World’s Most Secure Email System
home_page.send_unbreakable_email: Send unbreakable emails & protect your key professional and personal details with next-gen encryption and storage on Icelandic servers, secure with the world’s strongest data privacy laws.

home_feature.end_to_end_PKI_encryption: End-to-end PKI encryption keeps your private information safe from governments, corporations and hackers-for-hire.
home_feature.safely_send_your_financial: Securely send your financial records, contracts, lab results, journalism and more, even to non-CTemplar email accounts, with anonymous email signup and no IP logging.
home_feature.iceland_based_server: Iceland has the world’s strongest data privacy laws, so by using our Icelandic servers, your data has the strongest legal protection in the world.
home_feature.easy_to_use_responsive: Easy-to-use, responsive website and app make sending secure emails quick and easy from any device.
home_feature.learn_more_about_ctempler: Learn more about the security features of CTemplar

footer.register_to_world_most: Register for the World’s Most Secure Email now!
footer.send_unbreakable_emails: Send unbreakable emails & protect your key professional and personal details with next-gen encryption using privacy-centric Icelandic storage..

page_about.as_the_govt_continues: As the government continues to function completely outside the realm of accountability, all of us—reporter, missionary, student, businessperson, citizen—become one person, in need of privacy and protection.
page_about.idea_to_create_service:
The idea to create this service first began when I recognized about the atrocities happening in the Middle East, to the innocents and to humanity. Looking around, it would seem the larger world was too busy to pay much attention,distracted by their own affairs or helpless to offer assistance.
As just one man with limited capabilities, what could I do? Months went by as I pondered this question, finally realizing I must use my own strengths to wage a larger fight against the oppression I see in the world. As a result, I turned to technology—something I know and understand—to create a system of communication so strong and resilient I would trust it with my own life.

Through this effort to protect communications through encryption, an entirely new service has emerged, one that will never sell out to corporate investors or be weakened by international agendas.
page_about.nearly_a_thousand_year: Nearly a thousand years ago there was a group of men known as the Knights Templar. They protected the wandering pilgrims who wanted nothing more than to visit the Holy Land and find a way to achieve spirituality.
page_about.the_templer_safeguard:
The Templar safeguarded travelers’ paths by monitoring the roadways and helping them find a successful journey. The Templar stood for righteousness, willing to lay down their lives for the poor and the weak, even if it led to their death.
Today, there are many people in the world still suffering from this same fear once felt by the innocents, as they look for ways to live their lives in peace and without intrusion. Perhaps you are one of them. I believe we now find ourselves in need of a new Templar, one that can deliver protection against the ongoing invasion of our personal lives.
Little by little, your privacy is being stolen away—as is mine—and the time is now to reclaim our rights, our freedoms, our anonymity, and to remember the strength of those who came before us, ready and willing to wield a weapon in their own defense. And for us, for modern society, that tool is technology.
page_about.ctempler_is_a_powerful_tool: CTemplar is a powerful tool for everyone from the oppressed to journalists and businesses. Here’s a list of a few of the types of people who can benefit from CTemplar’s privacy:
page_about.educators_and_missionaries:
• Educators and missionaries under threat of persecution and death
  • Refugees fleeing from oppressive regimes in their home country
  • Reporters in war-torn and/or dictator-led countries
  • Students looking for communication but finding only oppression
  • Someone working in a business environment where competitor surveillance runs rampant
  • Consumers who want to protect their financial information
  • A relatively safe and comfortable individual who worries about privacy
page_about.regardless_who_you_are: Regardless of who you are and what you seek, this encrypted service is here to help you find your way. If you need assurance that your message , your vision, and your words will be protected from the eyes of those who would hamper them—this service is for you.
page_about.ctempler_legal_team_views:
CTemplar’s legal team views internet privacy as a dynamic issue. It is an evolving landscape. Accordingly, static solutions will not afford your data the level of protection demanded by those who value security.

We have researched all aspects of internet privacy in various jurisdictions in order to assure that our servers are domiciled in the most secure location. Our servers are located in Iceland, recognized as the premier location for internet privacy. The Icelandic government has demonstrated itself to be at the forefront of internet privacy and vigorously enforces the right to be free of government intrusion.

Our legal department continues to research internet security and privacy laws throughout the world so that we may constantly provide users with the maximum level of internet privacy. If there is a proposed change in policy, we will be first to know and have a migration plan in place that ensures complete ongoing security.

page_security.end_to_end_encryption: End-to-End Encryption using Open Source Cryptography
page_security.whether_you_are_sending: Whether you’re sending classified information to your accountant, business partners, clients, news networks or simply your friends, your emails are automatically encrypted using strong public key cryptography on our Icelandic servers, so even we can’t read them. Only you and your recipient can decode your emails.
page_security.benefit_from_world: Benefit from the World’s Strictest Data Protection Laws
page_security.most_encrypted_email: Most encrypted email service providers boats about their Swiss data centers. What they don’t tell you is the Swiss government has an information sharing agreement with USA, so your data isn’t 100% secure. Iceland has zero sharing agreements and maintains the strictest data privacy laws in the world, so your data stays encrypted on our servers and nowhere else!
page_security.guaranted_anonymity: Guaranteed Anonymity and Zero Access to Your Data
page_security.we_dont_require_any: We don’t require any personal information to create your encrypted email account. Simply chose a username and password to access your email interface. For additional security, we don’t store your IP logs which can be traced to your anonymous email account. With CTemplar, your privacy is guaranteed.
page_security.simple_to_use: Simple-to-use Interface Just Like a Regular Email Account
page_security.unlike_the_old_days: Unlike the old days where encrypted emailing meant complex manual encryption and private server setup, CTemplar does it all for you. Simply send and receive your emails just like a regular email account and rest assured knowing your privacy is 100% maintained.
page_security.encrypted_email_to_non: Encrypted email to non-CTemaplar acounts, self-destructing messages & much more….
page_security.your_contacts_dont_require: Your contacts don’t require a CTemplar account in order to send and receive encrypted emails, they just need access to your Public Key in order to decrypt and open your messages. However, we do recommend everyone use CTemplar email accounts for maximum security since even your stored emails and subject lines will be protected, unlike regular accounts.

page_pricing.do_not_show_ads: We do not show ads or make money by abusing your privacy. Instead, we depend on your support to keep the service running. Revenue from paid accounts is used to further develop CTemplar and support free users such as democracy activists and dissidents who need privacy but can't necessarily afford it.

create_account.name: Create your account
create_account.class_encrypted_email:
Best in class encrypted email
Account creation in only minutes
create_account.new_email_address: This will be your new Ctemplar email address.
create_account.checking_box: By checking this box you understand that If you lose your password and do not set a recovery email your account will not be recoverable.
create_account.password_connected: Your password is connected to your encryption key, if you change your password then you will be issued a new encryption key and ALL contents of your account will be lost except for your email address.
create_account.recover_account: This is used to recover your account if you forget your password
create_account.check_box: Please check this box if you agree to abide by our

billing_info.pending_payment_alert: Your payment is pending, But still you can create a free account and your account would be upgraded to premium after payment is verified
billing_info.bitcoin_sent_timer: BTC sent after timer will be lost!

page_terms.welcome_to_ctemplar: Welcome to www.ctemplar.com ("Service" or "Site") owned and operated by CTemplar. By clicking "I Agree" on the account registration or payment page or using the Site in any way, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by this Agreement, the Privacy Policy, and all rules, policies and disclaimers posted on the Site or about which you are notified (collectively "Terms"). If you do not agree with all the Terms, or if you are under the age of eighteen (18), do not use the Site. Please review all of the Terms carefully before using the Site.
page_terms.using_the_site: By using the Site, you (i) agree to be bound by the Terms, (ii) represent that you are over the age of thirteen (18) and able to form legally binding contracts, (iii) agree and acknowledge that by using the Service you are accepting a benefit that cannot be disgorged, (iv) represent that you are neither located in sanctioned country nor a prohibited person.
page_terms.please_note_terms: PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE TERMS PROVIDE THAT IF YOU AND CTEMPLAR ARE UNABLE TO RESOLVE ANY DISPUTES THAT ARISE BETWEEN YOU AND CTEMPLAR AND THE DISPUTE IS NOT RESOLVED INFORMALLY OR THROUGH MEDIATION, THE DISPUTE WILL BE RESOLVED BY BINDING ARBITRATION. ARBITRATION USES A NEUTRAL ARBITRATOR INSTEAD OF A JUDGE OR JURY AND IS SUBJECT TO VERY LIMITED REVIEW BY COURTS. ARBITRATORS CAN AWARD THE SAME DAMAGES AND RELIEF THAT A COURT CAN AWARD. YOU AND CTEMPLAR ALSO AGREE THAT ANY CLAIMS OR DISPUTES CANNOT BE BROUGHT AS A CLASS ACTION. PLEASE CAREFULLY REVIEW THE DISPUTE RESOLUTION SECTION BELOW IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THE ARBITRATION PROVISION BELOW, YOU MAY NOT USE THE SITE.
page_terms.ctemplar_may_modify: CTemplar may modify any of the Terms at any time by posting them on the Site. Such posting shall constitute proper Notice. Changes shall automatically be effective upon posting; provided, however, that those changes that CTemplar, in its sole discretion, deems material changes to the Terms will be effective as to an existing User upon the earlier of: (1) the agreement of the User; or (2) thirty (30) days after notice to the existing User, either via email from a @ctemplar.com email address to the User's email address on file with CTemplar or via other means including but not limited to a pop-up or banner,  message or other conspicuous notice on the Site. If you affirmatively agree to the new terms, your agreement will be effective immediately. You agree to make any and all necessary arrangements so that you (and not your spam filter) receive all emails from CTemplar’s email addresses. Your use of the Service post-notification will signify your acceptance of the changes. If you do not accept the changes,  your sole and exclusive remedy is to discontinue using the Site. The latest Terms will be posted on the Site, and you should always review them prior to using the Site.
page_terms.must_be_member:
You must be a member to use our services. To become a member you must complete our registration process, which requires the selection of a user name and password. You agree to keep your password safe at all times and not to disclose it to any other person. You are solely responsible for the security of your computer system. CTemplar will not be liable for any loss that you may incur if someone else is using your account, either with or without your knowledge.
You may not use anyone else's account, without the permission of the account holder. You agree that CTemplar has no responsibility or liability for the deletion, corruption or failure to store any messages or other content maintained or transmitted by any CTemplar service.
page_terms.license_to_acess: YOUR LICENSE TO ACCESS AND USE THE SERVICES AND OWNERSHIP
page_terms.content_information: The content, information, software, designs, materials, functions and data included in and contained on the Services (the "Content") are protected by intellectual property and other laws. You must comply with these and any other applicable laws when you use the Services.
